project.world.ship.weapons.SalvoWeapon.SalvoWeaponInstance
Enclosing class:
SalvoWeapon
public class SalvoWeapon.SalvoWeaponInstance extends Weapon.WeaponInstance
Represents an instance of a weapon which propels the player forward and drops mines behind it.
